description: Alpha Protocol, the spy RPG developed by Obsidian Entertainment, has quietly returned to sale on Steam. Unfortunately, it's not yet featuring the enhancements seen in the recent GOG re-release. Read more...
title: Obsidian's spy RPG Alpha Protocol quietly returns to Steam after delisting in 2019

description: Ubisoft CEO Yves Guillemot has confirmed in an interview that the company's goal is to have more regular Assassin's Creed entries, with every year offering a different take on the series. Read more...
title: Ubisoft wants yearly Assassin's Creed games, multiple remakes also in development

description: Logitech is rolling out a new update for its Options Plus software. Version 1.76 is out with support for a new keyboard and remote controls, plus Perplexity compatibility with Smart Actions. Read more...
title: Logitech Options Plus gets Perplexity AI and new keyboard support

description: A new report suggests that Apple could make it easier to remove iPhone batteries. The company is exploring a new process that will help dislodge the iPhone's battery quickly from its chassis. Read more...
title: Apple could make iPhone's battery easier to remove, says report

description: AMD has announced that FidelityFX Super Resolution 3.1 has officially launched and is available in five PC games published by Sony. Also, the earlier FSR 3 is now supported by 60 PC games. Read more...
title: AMD FSR 3.1 officially launches; supported by five Sony PlayStation Studios PC games

description: Microsoft continues to update its Loop collaboration service. Today, it has added some more features for people who use its boards, including a way to expand them into margins and more. Read more...
title: Microsoft Loop has added more functions for its boards such as expanding them into margins

description: OpenAI has trained a new model called CriticGPT to catch LLM bugs. As the name says, it's meant to analyze ChatGPT's code outputs during the training process and provide critiques for human trainers. Read more...
title: OpenAI bakes "CriticGPT" model to find mistakes in ChatGPT's answers

description: Gemma 2, particularly the 27B model, delivers class-leading performance comparable to models twice its size. It's designed to run on a single GPU or TPU, significantly reducing deployment costs. Read more...
title: Google's Gemma 2 delivers powerhouse performance at a fraction of the cost

description: Here is your chance to purchase the famous Logitech MX Master 3S, arguably one of the best productivity mice out there for Windows and Mac, with a 10% discount thanks to a digital coupon on Amazon. Read more...
title: Logitech MX Master 3S is now 10% off with a digital coupon

description: Members of the Microsoft 365 Insider program can try out two new features for Excel in Windows and Mac that help detect and translate text in the app from over 100 different languages Read more...
title: Microsoft 365 Insiders can try out new text language and translation features in Excel

description: Today, you can get your hands on the 2TB SanDisk Extreme M2 PCIe Gen 4 NVMe Internal SSD at its lowest price from Amazon US. It is now available for only $139.99, which is just 6 cents per GB. Read more...
title: 2TB SanDisk Extreme M.2 NVMe SSD is available at its lowest price on Amazon

description: The Steam Summer Sale of 2024 is finally here, and it is featuring discounts for almost everything on the PC games store. Even a special "Deep Discounts" section promotes 95% off games. Read more...
title: Steam Summer Sale 2024 opens its doors, brings discounts for almost every PC game and DLC

description: Sony has revealed the dates for both the Early Access and Open Beta periods for its upcoming team first-person shooter Concord, which will be available on PS5 and PC platforms later in 2024. Read more...
title: Sony reveals Concord Early Access and Open Beta dates for PlayStation and PC platforms

description: Microsoft has finally added the long-requested checkboxes feature in its Excel spreadsheet apps for Windows and Mac platforms. They will also be added to the web and mobile editions soon. Read more...
title: Microsoft adds checkboxes in its Excel Windows and Mac apps with web and mobile coming soon

description: YouTube has started rolling out Jump Ahead and picture-in-picture mode for Shorts videos. These features are now available to Premium users along with some opt-in experiments to try out. Read more...
title: YouTube Premium gets Jump Ahead and picture-in-picture for Shorts

description: TIME and OpenAI have formed a multi-year partnership, granting OpenAI access to TIME's century-long archive of journalism. This content will be integrated into OpenAI's products, like ChatGPT. Read more...
title: OpenAI strikes again: TIME joins growing list of content partners for ChatGPT

description: The excellent deals on AVRs and soundbars with subwoofers may not be what you are after. If you want something that is geared more towards music and partying, this Pyle 4-piece may be what you need. Read more...
title: Amazon Deal: Powerful Pyle 4-piece mini HiFi 2.1 DSP party music system hits low price

description: AMD's graphics driver for June is here with official support for Windows 11 version 24H2. The packed driver also has support for upcoming games, AI workload improvements, and more. Read more...
title: AMD 24.6.1 driver adds support for Windows 11 24H2, Once Human, and more

description: Microsoft has announced some contact feature improvements for Mac users of its Outlook email app. They include a new large profile card along with upgrades for finding contacts and more. Read more...
title: Microsoft adds contacts improvements to the Mac version of Outlook

description: 0patch, a platform for distributing security patches for various products, has announced that it plans to provide five years of additional support for Windows 10 after the OS reaches its end of life. Read more...
title: Windows 10 will get five years of additional support thanks to 0patch

description: Razer has launched new versions of some of its popular PC gaming accessories that have logos and artwork based on Epic Games' hit battle royale title Fortnite, which also include in-game items. Read more...
title: Razer has launched new Fortnite branded PC gaming accessiors with special in-game items

description: Audi is revolutionizing the driving experience by integrating ChatGPT into millions of vehicles starting in July. Audi assures drivers that privacy is a top priority, and it will not store any data. Read more...
title: Audi announces ChatGPT integration for two million Audi cars made since 2021

description: Xbox Game Pass Ultimate and Core subscribers can now jump into the simulator Train Sim World 4 as well as the battle royale entry Pac-Man Mega Tunnel Battle as part of the latest Free Play Days. Read more...
title: Xbox Free Play Days gain Train Sim World 4 and Pac-Man Mega Tunnel Battle this weekend

description: The Blu-ray of Star Trek: Picard is at its lowest price to date for just $47.99. At this price, you are saving 31% as it usually costs $69.99. It includes all three seasons and special features. Read more...
title: Get Star Trek: Picard - The Complete Series now for just $47.99

description: FromSoftware's newly released Elden Ring expansion is already a massive hit. Shadow of the Erdtree has sold a whopping five million copies across all platforms within just three days of launch. Read more...
title: Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree expansion sells five million copies in three days

description: PC gamers can now claim a copy of Sunless Skies: Sovereign Edition from Failbetter Games, a Lovecraftian exploration-heavy RPG where you journey across the universe as part of the Victorian empire. Read more...
title: Sunless Skies: Sovereign Edition is free to claim on the Epic Games Store this week

description: With a focus on data structures and algorithms, this free to download eBook helps you fill gaps in your knowledge, prepare for a technical interview, feel knowledgeable and confident on the job. Read more...
title: Download: "The Self-Taught Computer Scientist" eBook ($19 Value) for free

description: Microsoft and Amazon have announced that owners of Fire TV 4K and 4K Max streaming sticks will soon be able to play Xbox games via cloud streaming with an Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscription. Read more...
title: Amazon Fire TV 4K and 4K Max streaming sticks will soon be able to play Xbox cloud games

description: Forza Horizon 4 is seeing a massive surge of interest in the PC Steam version, with over 70,000 concurrent players online following its delisting notice and a big price discount this week. Read more...
title: Forza Horizon 4 has over 70,000 concurrent players on Steam following its delisting notice

description: The Dragon Edition of the 1TB SanDisk external solid-state drive is currently available at its lowest price so, you may want to consider this storage solution, with a unique design, for your needs. Read more...
title: 1TB SanDisk Dragon Edition SSD (USB 3.2 Gen2) drops to lowest price on Amazon

description: Nvidia 556.12 WHQL is the company's latest driver for PC gamers with "green" graphics cards. Today's update delivers optimization for The First Descendant, DLSS 3 support for PAYDAY 3, and more. Read more...
title: Nvidia 556.12 WHQL driver is out with The First Descendant support and more

description: 11 Bit Studios today announced a two-month delay for Frostpunk 2. The studio is adding new features and mechanics to the survival city builder thanks to community feedback from the recent beta. Read more...
title: Frostpunk 2 delayed to September as studio plans new game mechanics

description: Capcom's latest Resident Evil game, Resident Evil Village, along with its free demo, is one of three games that are being added to the Nvidia GeForce NOW cloud gaming service this week. Read more...
title: Resident Evil Village is one of three games that join Nvidia GeForce NOW this week

description: Owners of the Surface Laptop Go 2, Microsoft's entry-level laptop, can download a new firmware update, which will fix audio disruptions, Wi-Fi issues, and Bluetooth connectivity issues. Read more...
title: Surface Laptop Go 2 gets fixes for Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, and audio issues

description: Uber's new experiment will give $1,000 to people who can ditch their cars for some time. The participants will have to record experiences using transport modes like public transit and rideshare. Read more...
title: Uber challenge will give you $1,000 if you ditch your car for a while

description: SoftBank is allegedly looking to invest between $10 million and $20 million in the startup Perplexity AI. Sources said that no deal has yet been finalised, so we may see differences or no deal at all. Read more...
title: SoftBank is reportedly looking to invest up to $20 million in Perplexity AI

description: In a massive update, Google has added 110 new languages to Google Translate. These new languages represent more than half a billion people, and their translation is powered by Google's PaLM 2 LLM. Read more...
title: Google Translate can now translate 110 new languages

description: Are you looking for a Chromebook that is both a laptop and a tablet? Then look no further than the Acer Chromebook Spin 314 CP314-1H. It has 4GB of RAM and 128GB of storage space. It's under £270. Read more...
title: Save £100 on the 2-in-1 14-inch Acer Chromebook Spin 314 CP314-1H

description: Microsoft has issued a warning that the recent Windows 11 updates (KB5039302) can cause significant issues on some PCs. Affected systems cannot boot and fall into a boot loop, restarting indefinitely. Read more...
title: Microsoft pauses Windows 11 KB5039302 rollout as it breaks PCs and causes infinite restarts

description: A community of Rabbit R1 developers has found a serious flaw in the company's code that allows third parties to access text prompts sent through R1, which could contain sensitive data. Read more...
title: Rabbit R1 has a huge security flaw that leaves private responses accessible to everyone

description: Amazon's market cap has passed $2 trillion for the first time ever putting it in an exclusive club with Nvidia, Apple, Alphabet, and Microsoft. Read on to learn how it has joined this club. Read more...
title: Amazon joins the $2 trillion market cap club with Microsoft and Apple

description: A few weeks ahead of their debut, we now have a gallery of images that could very well be of the first-party protective cases for the upcoming Samsung Galaxy Z Flip6 and the Galaxy Z Fold6. Read more...
title: Here's a look at what could be the first-party cases for the Galaxy Z Flip6 and Z Fold6

description: The 42-inch LG OLED Evo C4 Series TV includes a 144 Hz refresh rate, support for both Nvidia G-Sync and AMD FreeSync Premium, and more. It just hit a new all-time low price of $1,196.99. Read more...
title: Get this 42-inch LG OLED Evo C4 Series TV for its lowest price ever

description: Google Sheets is getting a significant performance boost on Chrome and Microsoft Edge browsers, and Gemini for Workspace integration for summarization, pre-built tables for easy starts and more. Read more...
title: Google Sheets is receiving a major performance update on Chrome and Microsoft Edge browsers

description: Capcom will hold a streaming event, Capcom Next, on Monday, July 1, where it will reveal more info on the just announced Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster, along with info on two more Capcom games. Read more...
title: Capcom Next on July 1 will reveal more info on the Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster and more

description: Amazon is reportedly launching an ultra-cheap storefront to compete with Temu and Shein. According to supposed presentation notes, the storefront will launch in the fall but Amazon didn't confirm it. Read more...
title: Amazon is planning to compete directly with Temu and Shein with low-cost storefront

description: You can try out the new Minion-themed special driving experience in Google's Waze navigation app. It's available to users across the globe with support for voice directions in multiple languages. Read more...
title: Google's Waze adds a new Minion-themed driving experience
